text: Khuang Aphaiwong (; 17 May 1902 â€“ 15 March 1968), also known by his noble title Luang Kowit-aphaiwong (), was the founder of the Democrat Party and served as the Prime Minister of Thailand three times: from August 1944 to 1945, from January to May 1946, and from November 1947 to April 1948. Category:1902 births Category:1968 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Thailand
title: Khuang Aphaiwong
